name: Chadventures in Snowland
description:
Note: HTML5 (browser) version is currently incompatible with Chromium browsers (laggy), please use Firefox, or if it still lags, download the game for Windows below.  Chadventures in Snowland

Chad is on a journey to harvest as much 🚜 FARM as possible during the winter months.
Will you set the high score in this  DeFi-themed endless runner?

Controls:
Space - Jump 🚜
Left click - Throw bread 🥖
Escape - Pause ⏸️

Best played in full-screen

Made by Tiernan.eth for the Harvest.Finance creativity contest #4
